attributes.action: Ban the introduction of Sharia Law within the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details:
The arrival of Sharia law within the UK is becoming a major problem. It is not compatible with a democratic state, it's barbaric, sexist, homophobic, and does not allow the freedom of speech in some circumstances.

I call for the government for a referendum on this matter to be able to see if the UK would adopt Sharia law or oppose it.
